reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made and comfortable, with soft, luxurious velvet material that's stretchy and allows for movement.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance with a Soft Touch
items.body: I love this dress. I purchased it in royal blue for a formal event, a fall evening wedding, with royal blue shoes and bag. The dress has a sexy appeal because one shoulder is exposed, but yet it is warm, and comfortable. Also, it has a split to the knee so a little bit of leg is exposed, just enough but not too much. All you got to do is "strut." Elegant to the eyes, and soft to the touch. A very nice look. "Classy not Trashy." I recommend this purchase. Read more
items.author: Judy Hampton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress..Just Get It!!
items.body: I bought this dress for my daughter as she loves this style dress. I ended up buying 2 colors as she is in college and just needs go to dresses in her closet for galas, dances, dates, etc. What's great about it, besides the fit, is it can come across high end for the dressiest of events or worn out for a special dinner date for a nice night. You can do both without looking over or under dressed for either scenario. The colors are just beautiful too. My daughter wears a 14/16 & I got the XXL only because she preferred it. She is probably more a true XL but she likes to bunch the fabric for a shirred look in the tummy area, and it looks phenomenal on her curves!! I would say if you're around that size, an XL will truly fit like a glove smooth and the XXL gives a shirred look but is still close & fitted to the body, not loose. Get the dress, you won't be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Alexander

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fit
items.body: Nice elegant look. Breathable material that doesn't Bunch up. Very comfortable and accentuating Read more
items.author: Case

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars NICE!
items.body: This dress is NICE! The material is decent quality, it fits me perfectly, and looks elegant. Definitely a good find for the price. Only thing is that the purple in the picture is not a true reflection of the color; however, it’s still nice dress. Read more
items.author: shasha72

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The body was TEA, in this dress!!!!
items.body: This dress was perfect for the occasion. Im usually a medium. The medium fit me fine. Im 5'4" it fit me well, length wise in heels.... no zipper, plenty stretch. The spilt was a nice touch. Read more
items.author: LaToya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy and style, but not flattering if you have a midsection you need to work on
items.body: This was a nice dress for the price however I did not keep it due to how it looked on me in the midsection area. If you are conscious about your stomach and wearing items that are too tight, I would not purchase it. Other than that I loved the way it looked. The material was good and the half shoulder out set it off. Read more
items.author: Martina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful dress
items.author: Egyptian Goddess

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars You can buy it, IT'S A MUST BUY
items.body: Eventhough this dress looks flawless on me and im keeping it, I will not purchase again. The material is itchy but stretchy Update- yall the material didnt itch lol but its not the soft material either, this dress is great, it really compliment my physique and I was so beautiful Read more
items.author: ms lou

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Split Long Sleeve One Shoulder Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Split Long Sleeve One Shoulder Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 0gold, 0tan, 589green, 0black, 0light Blue, 0light Green, 11450gold, 0red, 0lake Blue, 0blue, 0green, 589blue, 0purple, 0pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
